alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Fremont; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 02 at 4:58PM MDT until July 02 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... East Central Fremont County in central Colorado... Southern El Paso County in east central Colorado... Northwestern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 458 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pueblo, Florence, Pueblo West, Penrose, Pinon and Canon City. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
